Plot: An alien civilization is invaded by Astronaut Chuck Baker, who believes that the planet was uninhabited. Wanted by the military, Baker must get back to his ship before it goes into orbit without him.
Title: Planet 51
Writer: Javier Abad (original idea by), Jorge Blanco (original idea by), Marcos Martínez (original idea by), Ignacio Pérez Dolset (original idea by), Joe Stillman
Actors: Jessica Biel, John Cleese, Gary Oldman, Dwayne Johnson
tomatoConsensus: Planet 51 squanders an interesting premise with an overly familiar storyline, stock characters, and humor that alternates between curious and potentially offensive.
Director: Jorge Blanco, Javier Abad, Marcos Martínez
